channel.title: [PI] How do I change the IP adress in the client and server?
channel.description: Hey guys I was just wondering, how do I change the IP address that my client and server goes to so I can host other ppl coming on? and also as another question... do I have to port forward using Hamatchi?

item.title: [PI] How do I change the IP adress in the client and server?
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

You portforward through your router. Hamachi is a bad alternative… I mean, if you both have it installed and wish to do it that way, then be my guest.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How do I change the IP adress in the client and server?

item.title: [PI] How do I change the IP adress in the client and server?
item.dc:creator: @tyyy9 tyyy9
item.description:
@tyyy9 wrote:

I’m only wanting to have a friend come in the game and help test things so do I still have to forward the port with hamatchi? Stupid iPod typos…

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How do I change the IP adress in the client and server?

item.title: [PI] How do I change the IP adress in the client and server?
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

I really suggest not using hamachi, as that requires other users to download hamachi. Just search for either localhost or 127.0.0.1 in the client. It will most likely be located in either the client class or the GUI class.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How do I change the IP adress in the client and server?
